June 29, 1907 D East Kirkby Contest (First Section)
East Kirkby Contest (First Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
east-kirkby-contest-first-section
None
Daughter of the Regiment [unknown arranger]
East Kirkby, Nottingham 1st prize £9 and cup, 2nd prize £5 and 3rd prize £2.10s. divided between Grimesthorpe and Lea Mills, 4th prize £1.10s. 8 bands competed.
March 24, 2012, 9:31 a.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 6:40 p.m.
